name: Run From An Underground Drill
description:
Run from an underground drill! 
See how long you can last while collecting as many gems as possible.
It's an infinite runner, using very nice graphics by Matt Walkden. 
And an orchestral battle track by VGComposer.
Made using the Tabageos JavaScript library.

Use d or left to start moving. Use up or w to jump.

To use a usb connected game pad, first start the game, then press one of the directional buttons on your game pad, and then follow the on screen prompts.

On touch devices a touch controller will appear below the game.

Have fun and thanks for playing!
